content: I am a student pursuing my BTech degree at Gitam University in Bengaluru. From a young age, I have had a passion for design, which sparked my interest in web design. As I delved deeper into this field, I gained a comprehensive understanding of web development and competitive programming. Currently, I am dedicated to enhancing my skills in these areas and building a strong foundation for a successful career. My love for design and technology drives me to continuously improve and expand my knowledge.

details.description: I am a student of Computer Science and Engineering with specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
I am a front-end developer with a strong understanding of Html, Css, JavaScript and its libraries, including React.
I am a beginner in competitive programming, where I put my problem-solving and algorithmic skills to the test.
I am a designer with moderate proficiency in both Photoshop and Figma.

name: CodeX Club . GITAM University
description: As a core member of CodeX, a student-run club at GITAM University, I am entrusted with the responsibility of designing and executing front-end development projects. Furthermore, I am dedicated to continuously enhancing my skills and knowledge in the field of technology through ongoing learning.

education.name: Graduation . Bachelor of Technology
education.description: I am a student at Gitam University in Bangalore, India. I use my free time to focus on skill-building and self-improvement.Gitam University provides a challenging and supportive learning environment.My primary focus is on academic success and personal growth.I am determined to make the most of my university experience and come out with a solid education and valuable knowledge.

education.name: Intermediate
education.place: Krishna Chaitanya Junior Collage, Nellore, AndhraPradesh
education.description: I have successfully completed my intermediate education with a major in MPC (Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry).

education.name: Higher Secondary School
education.description: Iam have completed my high school with state board syllubus of AndhraPradesh including Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Chesmistry.

certificates.name: Introduction to Front-End Development by Meta

work.name: Url Shortener
work.description: üåê‚úÇÔ∏è I've created a tool using Next.js, a powerful web development framework, that helps you turn those long, cumbersome URLs into short and easy-to-share links. It's perfect for sharing with others! The best thing is that when someone clicks on these shortened links, they will be automatically redirected to the original, long URL without any hassle.

work.name: Simple Calculator
work.description: It is a simple calculator where u can do simple arthemaatic calculation like addition,subtraction etc. Basically i used simple html css and lit part of javascript.

work.description: This is a project of the club codex where we team members collab and do work based upon their skills. I am the designer of the website and Front end developer for this project
